top.title: Super typhoon makes landfall in Philippines as nearly a million evacuated
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong, with sustained winds of 185 km/h (115mph), made landfall on Sunday evening local time.

top.title: BBC on Luzon Island as super typhoon hits Philippines
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong has made landfall in the Philippines, where more than 900,000 people have been evacuated.

top.title: Israel receives body of soldier killed in 2014 in Gaza
top.summary: The Israeli military confirmed the soldier's body had been returned from Gaza after 11 years on Sunday.

top.title: Elon Musk's $1tn pay deal approved by Tesla shareholders
top.summary: The richest man in the world will get hundreds of millions of new shares if he hits his targets.

top.title: Why human-shaped robots loom large in Musk's Tesla plans
top.summary: The tech billionaire believes Optimus could play a big role in the lives of people around the world.

top.title: What does Elon Musk do with all his money?
top.summary: While he has a penchant for cars and jets, the world's richest person reportedly lives a relatively modest life.
